prompt: Outline a step-by-step plan for organizing a community clean-up event.
Create a daily study schedule for a student preparing for exams in two subjects.
Plan a week-long vegetarian meal plan for a family of four.
Develop a rollout plan for launching a new mobile app.
Plan a budget-friendly vacation itinerary for three days in Rome.
Create a project timeline for building a backyard shed.
Outline the steps needed to switch to a paperless office.
